project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a multiple-choice quiz game that tracks the user's score and displays it at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in a variable within the code.

task.name: Develop the user interface for the quiz
Implement scoring logic to track the user's score
Display the score at the end of the game
Write tests for the question and answer handling, scoring, and display logic
Execute tests on the complete game to ensure proper functionality
